name: SectorLandingPageContentTypes
description: Creates all dependent content types related to the Sector Landing Page
author: National Careers Service

ContentPartSettings.Description: Allows editors to enter a comment to be saved into the Audit Trail event when saving a content item.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides a way to define the url that is used to render your content item.
Adds publishing status workflow properties to content items.
Provides an optional part that allows content items to be excluded, or configured, on a content item.
Enables the content type to be synced to a graph.

HtmlFieldTrumbowygEditorSettings.Options:
{
    semantic: {
        'b': 'strong',
        'i': 'em',
        's': 'del',
        'strike': 'del',
        'div': 'div'
    },
    tagsToKeep: [
      "area",
      "base",
      "br",
      "col",
      "embed",
      "hr",
      "img",
      "input",
      "param",
      "source",
      "track",
      "wbr",

      "div",
      "iframe"
    ],
    autogrow: true,
    btns: [
        ["viewHTML"],
        ["undo", "redo"],
        ["heading", "paragraph", "fontSize"],
        ["fontWeight"],
        ["foreColor", "backColor"],
        ["links"],
        ["image"],
        ["align"],
        ["list", "bulletList", "numberList"],
        ["sectionBreak"],
        ["removeformat"],
        ["fullscreen"],
        ["accordion"],
        ["tabs"]
    ],
    btnsDef: {
        align: {
            dropdown: ["justifyLeft", "justifyCenter", "justifyRight", "justifyFull"],
            ico: "justifyLeft"
        },
        image: {
            dropdown: ["insertMedia", "base64","youtubeLink"],
            ico: "insertImage"
        }
    },
    plugins: {
      colors: {
          colorList: [
            '0b0c0c',
            '626a6e',
            '1d70b8',
            '003078',
            '4c2c92',
            'b1b4b6',
            'ffdd00',
            'd4351c',
            
            '003a69',
            '347ca9',
            
            '00703c',
            '5694ca',
            'f3f2f1',
            'ffffff',
            '6f72af',
            '912b88',
            'd53880',
            'f499be',
            'f47738',
            'b58840',
            '85994b',
            '28a197',
          ]
      }
  }
}

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Specify 'None' to hide video on sector landing page.
When you provide link text, a call to action button will display linking to the video or website URL.
This should be provided when embedding videos (for example, when embedding a YouTube video).
